items.title: Delightful in a nice way
items.content_html:
Long day will record PhD microcast report tomorrow morning. Morning mainly not getting Go Lang blog to sort as I want. Midday awesome chat with @dajbelshaw about MoodleNet. More on that soon hopefully! üòä and then afternoon mainly on delightful design and what it is and why it‚Äôs important not to ‚ÄúNudge‚Äù but to empower. Which was hard going on fact.

procterphd

The short-term, dopamine-driven feedback loops that we have created are destroying how society works. No civil discourse, no cooperation, misinformation, mistruth.
Previously this blog was hidden that was a mistake, this opens up all my PhD research which is the right thing to do, this is WIP aka not finished dlls.adamprocter.co.uk
Spent most of the #procterphd morning NOT working out how to get Go Lang to sort by date in my markdown files - any coders out there feel free to help! ‚òπÔ∏è - play.golang.org/p/bBR8wfc‚Ä¶

Episode 11 of my microcast is out. A brief chat on my new LG 4K screen, learning Godot 3 and that I üíõ micro.blog all recorded in a car park straight onto my MacBook Pro‚Ä¶

  • fragmentum.adamprocter.co.uk/episode-1‚Ä¶
Our new dolls hospital had a pretty exciting day with a visit from @afcwladies today @afc_wimbledon @manthyprocter #coyd
Mainly watching live Godot 3 tutorials today from @GDquest
